title: DRAGON East Asia Trailer Music Pack
description: Powerful Epic Trailer Music Pack, high-quality songs with great power, 14 tracks (11 unique + 3 variations) and 23 minutes of audio.
longDescription:
LISTEN NOW

EPIC, POWERFUL, RISING!

Feel free to listen before you buy :)


DRAGON is specially created for trailers, spots, advertisements, game scenes… The pack includes 14 tracks (11 unique + 3 extra variations). Very intense and powerful songs! Thanks for submitting your feedback and rating.

♬ 09 Eight Immortals (Alter) - 2:00

♬ 10 The Forbidden Kingdom (Alter) - 2:00

TEASER / SHORT (Taiko Drums)

♬ 12 Vermilion Bird - 0:40

♬ 13 White Tiger - 0:37

♬ 14 Black Tortoise - 0:36
technicalDetails:
★ Features:

  •  11 Unique songs + 3 extra variations (14 tracks)
  •  WAV and CUE Assets
  •  23:50 Minutes of Total Audio

Number of Audio Wavs: 14

Number of Audio Cues: 14

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 bit / Stereo

Does music loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 23:50

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: https://docs.unrealengine.com/5.0/en-US/working-with-audio-in-unreal-engine/
